name: DS2672-ITP-S106 - Piling First Pile Hold Points - Rev 1
template name: DS2672-ITP-S106 - Piling First Pile Hold Points - Rev 1

name: 7.07.01 - Inspection of any Reinforcement Cage Extension

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Designer inspection of reinforcement cage extensions for the first pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect (at random for subsequent piles at the same structure).
Verifying Document - Reinforcement Cage Inspection Record
Frequency - First pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect remainder
7.07.02 - Inspection of Reinforcement Cages Prior to Installation

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Designer inspection of the reinforcement cage for the first pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect (at random for subsequent piles at the same structure).
Verifying Document - Reinforcement Cage Inspection Record
Frequency - First pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect remainder
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Designer inspection of concreting for the first pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect (at random for subsequent piles at the same structure).
Verifying Document - Pile Construction Record Card
Frequency - First pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect remainder

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Designer inspection of the pile head prior to incorporation into the connecting structure for the first pile at every structure with the Opportunity to inspect (at random for subsequent piles at the same structure)
Frequency - First pile at every structure
